data.title: William Pitt the Elder, Strategic leadership at Home and Abroad during the Great War for the Empires (1756–1763)
data.meta_description: William Pitt the Elder, Strategic leadership at Home and Abroad during the Great War for the Empires (1756–1763) was published in Die Rückkehr der "Großen Männer" on page 21.
data.text:
Simms, Brendan. "William Pitt the Elder, Strategic leadership at Home and Abroad during the Great War for the Empires (1756–1763)". Die Rückkehr der "Großen Männer": Staatsmänner im Krieg. Ein deutsch-britischer Vergleich 1740-1945, edited by Karina Urbach and Brendan Simms, Berlin, New York: De Gruyter, 2010, pp. 21-40. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110232950.1.21
